definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Leshan city, located in the southwest of Sichuan province, belongs to coteau and highland area.
sentences.chinese: 樂山市位於四川省西南部，地處山區丘陵地帶。

sentences.english: The statue makes itself the most renowned scenic spot in Leshan City.
sentences.chinese: 這座雕像使自己成爲最知名的景區樂山市。

sentences.english: Leshan is a scenery touristy city.
sentences.chinese: 樂山市是風景旅遊城市。
